DOC.brief_summary: Background : Children 's emotional eating relate great BMI less healthy diet little know early development behavior . Objective : This study aim examine relationship preschool child 's emotional eating parental feeding practice use experimental manipulation child mood food intake laboratory set . Design : 25 3-5 year old child mother sit together ate standard meal satiety . Mothers complete questionnaire feed practice . Children assign control negative mood condition . Children 's consumption snack food absence hunger measure .
